---
id: data-automatic-report-schedule
title: Automatic Report Schedule
description: Set a schedule to automatically generate custom reports created by setting the DYNAMIC period.
keywords:
  - Automatic Report
  - Schedule
---

Set a schedule to automatically generate <Cmd sid='reportApp.customReport' product='2' /> created by setting the DYNAMIC period.

## Add auto-generated schedule

1. Click <Cmd sid='shell.header.data' /> or select <Cmd sid='shell.header.data' /> from the shortcut list at the top left of the screen on the <Cmd sid='shell.header.launcher' /> page.

2. Click <Cmd sid='reportApp.mainMenu.schedule' product='2' /> tab.

3. Click <Cmd sid='reportApp.addSchedule' product='2' /> at the top right of the screen.

   <Image src='/img/biostarx-data-auto-schedule-main.png' />

4. When the <Cmd sid='data.schedule.newSchedulePageTitle' /> screen appears, set each item.

### Information setting

Set basic information of Automatic Report Schedule.

<Image src='/img/biostarx-data-information.png' className='none' />

* <Cmd sid='reportApp.scheduleName' product='2' / >: Enter the schedule name.

### Report and schedule settings

Set the schedule to be automatically generated for each report.

<Image src='/img/biostarx-data-report-schedule.png' className='none' />

* <Cmd sid='reportApp.report' product='2' / >: Select a custom report to automatically generate. Only custom reports set to DYNAMIC period will appear.

* <Cmd sid='reportApp.frequency' product='2' / >: Set the frequency to automatically generate reports.

* <Cmd sid='reportApp.generateTime' product='2' / >: Set the time to automatically generate reports.

:::info

For more information about creating custom reports, refer to [the following](data-generate-reports#custom-report).

:::

### Report format settings

Set the format for each report.

<Image src='/img/biostarx-data-report-format.png' className='none' />

* <Cmd sid='reportApp.outputType' product='2' />: Set the automatically generate method of reports.

* <Cmd sid='reportApp.reportTitle' product='2' />: Select <Cmd sid='reportApp.showTitle' product='2' /> to display the report name as the title on every page.

* <Cmd sid='reportApp.header' product='2' />: If <Cmd sid='reportApp.showHeader' product='2' /> is selected, the header is displayed when the report is created. Select <Cmd sid='reportApp.onEveryPage' product='2' /> to display the header on every page.

    :::info

    The header may vary depending on the reports.

    :::

* <Cmd sid='reportApp.footer' product='2' />: Set whether to display page numbers.

* <Cmd sid='reportApp.fileFormat' product='2' />: Set the file format for exporting reports.

3. Click <Cmd sid="reportApp.apply" product='2' /> to save the settings.

:::info

If all settings are complete, set the path to save the report. For more details, refer to [the following](data-settings).

:::

## Delete auto-generated schedule

1. Click <Cmd sid='shell.header.data' /> or select <Cmd sid='shell.header.data' /> from the shortcut list at the top left of the screen on the <Cmd sid='shell.header.launcher' /> page.

2. Click <Cmd sid='reportApp.mainMenu.schedule' product='2' /> tab.

3. Click the checkbox of the schedule to delete from the auto schedule list.

   <Image src='/img/biostarx-data-auto-schedule-remove-item.png' />

4. Click <Cmd sid='common.button.delete' /> at the top right of the screen.
